testcase.name: Users who are not logged in should see a log-in screen on the home page.
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Users who are not logged in should see a log-in screen on the home page. Given I am not logged in ... passed in 0.000s When I visit the home page ... passed in 0.265s Then I should see the login page ... passed in 0.002s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Users who are logged in should see a different page.
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Users who are logged in should see a different page. Given I am logged in ... passed in 0.180s When I visit the home page ... passed in 0.016s Then I should see the home page ... passed in 0.000s And I should see a link to my profile ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Users who are logged in but not through Google should not see those links.
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Users who are logged in but not through Google should not see those links. Given I am logged in ... passed in 0.158s But I am not logged in through Google ... passed in 0.000s When I visit the home page ... passed in 0.015s Then I should not see a set of links for Google users ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Users with administrative privileges should see a link to the admin page.
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Users with administrative privileges should see a link to the admin page. Given I am logged in with administrative privileges ... passed in 0.156s When I visit the home page ... passed in 0.014s Then I should see a link to the admin page ... passed in 0.002s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Users without administrative privileges should not see a link to the admin page.
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Users without administrative privileges should not see a link to the admin page. Given I am logged in ... passed in 0.165s But I do not have administrative privileges ... passed in 0.000s When I visit the home page ... passed in 0.015s Then I should not see a link to the admin page ... passed in 0.002s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
